attributes.action: Revoke Welsh Senedd powers to change road legislation and control NHS services
attributes.additional_details: The senedd has mismanaged all Welsh NHS trusts leaving all of them in special measures which is detrimental to Welsh citizens health. New speed limit legislation endangers Welsh and all UK pedestrians, cyclists, horse riders, wildlife and motorists.
attributes.background: Remove senedd law making powers which adversely affect health and safety to UK citizens

rejection.details:
We already have a petition open calling for the devolution settlement for Wales to be amended to remove powers over speed limits, which you may wish to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/647178

You could start a petition about amending the devolution settlement in respect of health services, if that's what you'd like.
